item.name: Introduction
item.description:
The EtMDB API allows you to manage resources within the Database in a simple, programmatic way using HTTP requests. The endpoints are intuitive and powerful, allowing you to easily make calls to retrieve information or to execute actions directly accessing the database.

The API Documentation is created using Django Rest Framework and Swagger/OpenAPI method. All of the functionality that you are familiar with in the EtMDB website is also available through the API, allowing you to script the complex actions that your situation requires. 
The API documentation supports generating human-friendly HTML output for each resource when the HTML format is requested. These pages allow for easy browsing of resources, as well as forms for submitting data to the resources using the HTTP request methods. 
The API has two JSON or XML formatting.

EtMDB has many offerings for developers, but at its core, our API lets you do all the things that EtMDB users are able to in our mobile apps and websites. Be sure to read our Getting Started Guide before diving in below.

How can I access the API?
You need to contact us or send us email to get beta access to our API.

If you can't find your question answered on our FAQs, please send us mail at developers@etmdb.com

header.name: Allow
header.description: Valid actions for a specified resource. To be used for a 405 Method not allowed

header.name: Cache-Control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Language
header.description: The language the content is in

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Expires
header.description: Gives the date/time after which the response is considered stale

header.name: Keep-Alive
header.description: Custom header

header.name: Last-Modified
header.description: The last modified date for the requested object, in RFC 2822 format

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: Set-Cookie
header.description: an HTTP cookie

header.name: Transfer-Encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

header.name: Vary
header.description: Tells downstream proxies how to match future request headers to decide whether the cached response can be used rather than requesting a fresh one from the origin server.

header.name: X-Frame-Options
header.description: Clickjacking protection: "deny" - no rendering within a frame, "sameorigin" - no rendering if origin mismatch

header.name: strict-transport-security
header.description: A HSTS Policy informing the HTTP client how long to cache the HTTPS only policy and whether this applies to subdomains.

header.name: x-content-type-options
header.description: The only defined value, "nosniff", prevents Internet Explorer from MIME-sniffing a response away from the declared content-type

header.name: x-xss-protection
header.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) filter

request.description:
Return cast search result

### Response Class (Status 200)
__{param}__ argument can be
* artist first name
* artist last name
* artist username

For more details on how cast are listed [see here][ref].
[ref]: https://etmdb.com/en/cast-list/-updated_date

response.body: {"date":"2018-06-22 19:18:20","data":{"count":4,"next":null,"previous":null,"results":[{"uuid":"f23882230d69d601e37c6a1ebc275ff36926c2f2494388d7c554dc4e72fc12de","created_date":"2016-08-29 16:07:00","updated_date":"2017-11-15 21:44:14","slug":"abel-cinema","cinema_name":"Abel Cinema","established_in":"2000-01-01","description":"We do not have enough information about this cinema, Please send us your contributions to our Facebook page or send by email to info@etmdb.com","opens_at":"10:00:00","closes_at":"22:00:00","cinema_poster_image":"https://etmdb.com/static/images/cinema/CinemaDefaultLogo_gKqhVh3.png"},{"uuid":"57a4016736ad8f80b1c55900bb4ef4a94af9ed18a47ba5d0ed6241196a60b8e8","created_date":"2016-08-29 16:10:12","updated_date":"2016-08-29 16:10:12","slug":"addis-ababa-city-hall-cinema","cinema_name":"Addis Ababa City Hall Cinema","established_in":"1980-01-01","description":"Addis Ababa City Hall Cinema is located at the center of Piazza in front of St. Giorgis Church around Menelik Square. It is inside the building of the City Municipality","opens_at":"10:00:00","closes_at":"22:00:00","cinema_poster_image":"https://etmdb.com/static/images/cinema/CinemaDefaultLogo_bCf9h56.png"},{"uuid":"0cb44348d68eb95ed02fc786562eb8619f5124c2b3cb9e566915afc97205c138","created_date":"2017-06-16 22:05:19","updated_date":"2017-06-16 22:05:19","slug":"adot-cinema-and-theater","cinema_name":"Adot Cinema and Theater ","established_in":"2000-01-01","description":"አዶት ሲኒማ እና ቴአትር 600 ዘመናዊና ምቹ ወንበሮች ያሉት። 4k ፕሮጀክተር ያለው። 7.1 ሳውንድ ሲስተም የተገጠመለት።ዘመናዊ የስክሪን ያለው። የአዳራሽ ዙሪያ ስፒከሮች ያሉት።አስተማማኝ የድምፅ የሙቀትና የእሣት መቆጣጠሪያ መሳሪያዎች የተገጠመለት።ካፌ እና ሬስቶራንት ጁስ ባር ያለው።አስተማማኝ የመኪና ማቆሚያ ከጥበቃ ጋር ያለው። አድራሻ፦ ብስራተ ገብርኤል ቤተክርስቲያን አካባቢ አዶት መልቲፕሌክስ ሕንፃ ላይ። ","opens_at":"10:00:00","closes_at":"22:00:00","cinema_poster_image":"https://etmdb.com/static/images/cinema/AdotCinema.jpg"},{"uuid":"ad9549a309ae10ab4a9a7d0b077ed93490b6b5c70f5ebe2edc80f2cd25fb754b","created_date":"2016-08-29 16:08:29","updated_date":"2016-08-29 16:08:29","slug":"africa-cinema","cinema_name":"Africa Cinema ","established_in":"2000-01-01","description":"አፍሪካ ሲኒማ 500 ምቹ ወንበሮች ያሉት።የተመረጡ ሀገረኛ ፊልሞች የሚታዩበት ሲኒማ ቤት። በጀሞ አፍሪካ ሲኒማ ቁጥር-2 ስራ ይጀምራል። ሁለት ሲኒማ አዳራሾች።ቪ አይ ፒ |VIP| ወንበሮች ያሏቸው። 500 ወንበሮች ያሉት። አድራሻ፦ ቤተል ፖስታ ቤት ህንፃ ላይ። ","opens_at":"10:00:00","closes_at":"22:00:00","cinema_poster_image":"https://etmdb.com/static/images/cinema/CinemaDefaultLogo_YzZdjmE.png"}]},"status":200}

request.description:
Return cinema search result

### Response Class (Status 200)

* __{id}__: Used as a key to search cinemas,

For more details on how cinemas are listed [see here][ref].
[ref]: https://etmdb.com/en/cinema-list/-updated_date

response.name: Return cinema search result Success

header.name: Allow
header.description: Valid actions for a specified resource. To be used for a 405 Method not allowed

header.name: Cache-Control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Language
header.description: The language the content is in

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Expires
header.description: Gives the date/time after which the response is considered stale

header.name: Keep-Alive
header.description: Custom header

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: Set-Cookie
header.description: an HTTP cookie

header.name: Transfer-Encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

header.name: Vary
header.description: Tells downstream proxies how to match future request headers to decide whether the cached response can be used rather than requesting a fresh one from the origin server.

header.name: WWW-Authenticate
header.description: Indicates the authentication scheme that should be used to access the requested entity.

header.name: X-Frame-Options
header.description: Clickjacking protection: "deny" - no rendering within a frame, "sameorigin" - no rendering if origin mismatch

header.name: strict-transport-security
header.description: A HSTS Policy informing the HTTP client how long to cache the HTTPS only policy and whether this applies to subdomains.

header.name: x-content-type-options
header.description: The only defined value, "nosniff", prevents Internet Explorer from MIME-sniffing a response away from the declared content-type

header.name: x-xss-protection
header.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) filter

response.body: {"status":200,"date":"2018-06-14 17:02:37","data":{"count":4,"next":null,"previous":null,"results":[{"uuid":"6560675d76cba513efc8449ac2aac3378957f1ab6d3f1e18c58009bf0e05ebed","created_date":"2017-03-25 14:13:44","updated_date":"2017-08-29 09:09:42","slug":"2-arenguade-termusoch","movie_title":"2 Arenguade Termusoch","release_date":"2015-08-01","duration_minutes":95,"plot":"ከልጅነት እስከ ዕውቀት አብሮ ያደጉ ሁለት ጓደኛሞች በጋራ ስራ በሚሰሩበት ጊዜ በፍቅር ህይወታቸው እና በአስተሳሰባቸው የሚፈጠረውን ልዮነት የሚያስከትለውን ያሳያል","field_trans":"አረንጓዴ ጠርሙሶች","restriction":"PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)","flag_inCinema":false},{"uuid":"549f4e21b62847333407f1b7617105eab6dfacd005ba265950b15a689efab457","created_date":"2016-09-27 14:49:25","updated_date":"2016-09-27 14:49:25","slug":"2-lib","movie_title":"2 Lib (፪ ልብ)","release_date":"2015-06-20","duration_minutes":91,"plot":"ህሊና ጌታቸው ገነት ንጋቱ ያየራድ ማሞ አርሴማ አባይ ሌሎችም የሰሩት ፊልም 2 ልብ ከአርዲ ኢንተርቴይመንት","field_trans":null,"restriction":"G (General Audiences)","flag_inCinema":false},{"uuid":"d57673508dfbe3e1275386144ebaf640e370eb0e8c392ea4bd9487e1bb9cda65","created_date":"2016-09-27 19:06:50","updated_date":"2016-09-27 19:06:50","slug":"31","movie_title":"3+1","release_date":"2000-01-01","duration_minutes":91,"plot":"","field_trans":null,"restriction":"G (General Audiences)","flag_inCinema":false},{"uuid":"6b34aa2eafecad6197ed7ddd2802b71bec0ae933c96541fed244ef8d6d01147c","created_date":"2017-03-26 19:27:11","updated_date":"2017-08-29 08:18:42","slug":"300-shi","movie_title":"300 shi ","release_date":"2011-07-01","duration_minutes":107,"plot":"ከዮንቨርስቲ አንድ አመት ስለተቀጡ ቤት ተከራይተው አንድላይ የሚኖሩ ትልቅ ቃልኪዳን ያላቸው 3ትጓደኛሞች የሚያጋጥማቸውን ውጣ ውረድ ያሳያል","field_trans":"፫፻ ሺ","restriction":"G (General Audiences)","flag_inCinema":false}]}}
